citation: Proclamation under the Electricity - National Scheme (Tasmania) Act 1999 (Tas)
text:
Proclamation under the Electricity - National Scheme (Tasmania) Act 1999

I, the Governor in and over the State of Tasmania and its Dependencies in the Commonwealth of Australia, acting with the advice of the Executive Council, by this my proclamation made under section 2 of the Electricity - National Scheme (Tasmania) Act 1999 â€“

        (a) fix 29 May 2005* as the day on which the provisions of that Act commence; and
        (b) revoke the proclamation notified in the Gazette as Statutory Rules 2001, No. 159.
17 November 2003

RICHARD BUTLER

Governor

By His Excellency's Command,

P. A. LENNON

Minister for Economic Development, Energy and Resources

Displayed and numbered in accordance with the Rules Publication Act 1953.

Notified in the Gazette on 26 November 2003

This proclamation is administered in the Department of Infrastructure, Energy and Resources.
